name: Weapon's Trafficking
description:
This is a school project on which I worked on as the game designer, you play as a agent sent to stop the weapon trafficking of a criminal organization.

Control Scheme:

-WASD to move.

-CTRL to crouch

-Left-Shift to sprint

-Move mouse to look around and aim.

-Left click to shoot.

-R to reload.

-Scroll  mouse wheel to change weapon.

Team: 

Game Designer: Sebastien Lagos-Fuentes

Scripter: Dimitri Sky

Scripter: Francis Faubert

Art: Paulo Gois
